titleStmt.title: Observations on a late scandalous paper reflecting on the admiralty, &c. Said to be written by an English sailer. Humbly offer'd by one who is not a sailer, tho' of long service in the Navy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Published by John Nutt near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 reads: Observations on a scandalous paper, containing (among other things) several reflections on the admiralty.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
